# Credentials format

## Algorithmia

File: `algorithmia.json`

```
{
  "apiKey": "YOUR API KEY FROM ALGORITHMIA WEBSITE"
}
```

## Watson Natural Language Understanding

```
{
  "apiKey": "YOUR WATSON API KEY",
  "iam_apikey_description": "Auto generated apikey during resource-key operation for Instance - crn:v1:bluemix:public:natural-language-understanding:us-south:a/09a644157af24badb898438e9c0ef0cf:a04810c3-c825-4e97-a7d4-32c3a06a2544::",
  "iam_apikey_name": "auto-generated-apikey-96386589-7257-45e2-9a39-d229272ef7a7",
  "iam_role_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam::::role:Operator",
  "iam_serviceid_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam-identity::a/09a644157af24badb898438e9c0ef0cf::serviceid:ServiceId-05768989-a232-430a-bce1-bbc4533a9d75",
  "url": "https://gateway.watsonplatform.net/natural-language-understanding/api"
}

```
